summary: A mysterious stalker plagues a reality tv survivalist during his five days alone for a new season of his show in the northern Ontario wilderness; and the figure may not be human.
cast: Chris Diamantopoulos|Chloe Bradt|Michael Cram|Kelly Fanson|Sam Kalilieh|Alex Karzis|Constantine Meglis|Drew Nelson|Kate Ziegler
keywords: psychotronic film|low budget sci fi movie|video telephone|alien predator|alien contact
title: Man Vs.
